verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Chereko chereko chereko
chereko (chereko)
chereko chereko
Bwana amefufuka.

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Ni siku ya tatu,
malaika wa Bwana,
akamwambia Maria,
Bwana amefufuka.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Petro Yohane,
kaburini waenda,
wakalikuta kaburi,
kaburi likowazi.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Malaika kasema,
nendeni Galilaya,
huko ndiko aliko,
amewatangulia.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Ni siku ya furaha,
ni siku ya amani,
chereko chereko,
Bwana amefufuka.

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
Nyimbo nzuri tuimbe,
tukimsifu Mwokozi,
vigelegele na ngoma,
tuimbe aleluya.
